properties.areaDesc: Greene, AR; Dunklin, MO; Clay, AR
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 9:15AM CST until January 14 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Buttahatchie River...Obion River...Right Hand Chute Little River...
S.F. of the Forked Deer River...Saint Francis River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Saint Francis River near Saint Francis
* from Sunday January 12 until Monday January 13.
* At 08 AM Friday the stage was...14.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 22.5 feet on Sunday January 12.
* Flood stage is 22.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Sunday January 12 and
continue to rise to near 22.5 feet by Sunday January 12. The river
will fall below flood stage by Monday January 13.
At 23.0 feet, Most lowland inside the levee system is flooded..
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
